item.title: Improvements to the EMF approval process
item.description: ðŸ“£â€‹The CAG dashboard has just been updated! Key features include better alignment of workflows and approvals with Section 34 requirements, the reject feature returning transactions to AP coders for correction, the removal of the "Edit GCC" option, and much more. This update will be available on December 15. To learn more about the latest enhancements, check out our overview and the SAP Coffee Break Recording.

item.title: Alert
item.description: âš ï¸â€‹ SAP will be unavailable from Friday December 5 (3:00pm ET) to Sunday December 7 (9:00pm ET) and again from Friday December 12 (3:00pm ET) to Sunday December 14 (9:00pm ET) for routine maintenance. Please plan your work accordingly.
